response.overview: It's the story of an Egyptian woman of Jewish origin who revolutionized fashion but whose name remains little-known: Gaby Aghion. A bold and emancipated artist, she liberated women from “Haute Couture”, inventing a new idea of ​​ready-to-wear with clients like Brigitte Bardot, Jackie Kennedy and Maria Callas. Portrait of an inspiring example of female emancipation.
response.title: Looking for Chloé
